root.name: Dragon Ball Z Gaiden: Saiyajin Zetsumetsu Keikaku
root.description: Dragon Ball Z Gaiden: Saiyajin Zetsumetsu Keikaku (Dragon Ball Z Side Story: Plan to Eradicate the Saiyans) Gameplay takes the form of a Card Battle RPG, where the player chosen character movements and battle choices are dictated by the randomly generated cards the player receives.There was also 2 games released on the Bandai Playdia as a Prequel/Retelling of this game:Dragon Ball Z Side Story: True Plan to Eradicate the Saiyans: Earth Edition is part 1 in series the game was released on September 23, 1994.Dragon Ball Z Side Story: True Plan to Eradicate the Saiyans: Universe Edition is part 2 in the series the game was released on December 16, 1994.The story willl be redone with new animation for thew new dragonball game: Dragon Ball Raging blast 2 as a bonus feature
